attributes.action: Keep British Summer Time all year round. Have lighter afternoons in the winter.
attributes.background:
On Sunday the 25th of Oct 2015, the clocks will go back one hour. This will make the afternoons get dark an extra hour earlier - how depressing! Sunset will be at a ridiculous 3:51PM during the darkest week in December, unless we keep BST
Sign this petition to stop the clocks going back & #KeepBST!
